name: IT (1986 Novel)
description:
MADE IN THREE DAYS FOR A SCHOOL EVENT

Disclaimer: I do not own anything in this game and the plot and character's, as well as the cover image, is not mine and belongs to it's rightful owners.

A young twelve year old boy named Noah Anderson is curious enough to explore the sewers of Derry. But where will this lead him? And will he get out alive or fall victim to IT?

Sorry if it seems rushed, because it kind of is. Also my first Twine game, so it is a bit basic and not very flashy.
